Again, Rockseeker soaked the damage. He lifted his gun and targeted 
Hydras in the chest. He slowly pulled the trigger and the bullet 
traces flew in the air.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> Hydras doged most of the shots and he shouted 
angered"PREDACONS..... 
> ATTACK!!!!!!"
> 
> He opened fire 25 times agaisnt the intruder
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > The Minion was hit, but otherwise unaffected by the shots. He 
knew 
> he 
> > would feel those when the surge would pass...
> > 
> > But that was not here nor now. Tired of idle chatter with his 
> enemy 
> > he simply let his weapon do the talking, which they did 
abundantly.

in
